name: In Pursuit Of Chaos
description:
"In Pursuit Of Chaos" is a fast-paced first-person shooter made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, in which your antagonist is the primordial god of Chaos itself. After fighting yourself through waves of Lovecraftian monsters, while Chaos is manipulating time and space around you, you then face the god himself. Can you defeat the ancient Chaos?

  • 12 Levels and 1 Boss-Fight
  • 9 Powerups
  • 7 Random Events and 14 Chaos-Voice lines
  • Online scoreboard
  1. Movement is essential to avoid being hit. 
  2. The quicker you kill the enemies, the lower the odds of Chaos getting bored
  3. Any healing powerups are very important

WASD -> Movement

Space -> Jump

Left Mouse -> Shoot

R -> Reload
